text: José Marcelo Gomes (born November 24, 1981 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil) is a Brazilian naturalized Bolivian footballer currently playing for Club San José in the Liga de Futbol Profesional Boliviano. ==Club title== {| class="wikitable" !Season !Club !Title |- |2008 (C)|| Universitario de Sucre|| Liga de Fútbol Profesional Boliviano |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile in BDFA * * Profile in ESPN Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:Naturalized citizens of Bolivia Category:Bolivian people of Brazilian descent Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Universitario de Sucre footballers Category:Club Aurora players Category:Club Bolívar players Category:Club San José players Category:C.D. Jorge Wilstermann players
title: José Marcelo Gomes
